#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <stack>
#include <deque>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

int phi(ll num){
int result=num;
int j;
for (j=2; j*j<=num;j++){
    if (num%j==0){
        while (num%j==0){
            num/=j;
            }
        result-=result/j;
        }
    }
if (num>1){
    result-=result/num;
    }
return result;
}

int main(){
int t,n,i;
cin>>t;
for(i=0; i<t; i++){
    cin>>n;
    cout<<phi(n)<<endl;
    }
return 0;
}
